channel.title: [PI] Commands.java
channel.description: Sup guys, Nick here again with another question. So how would I go on and add a new kind of group in my commands.java? Like [code=java]public void SupportCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)[/code]

item.title: [PI] Commands.java
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Oh.
And could you help me with this one also?

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("news") && (c.playerRights == 5)) {
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						c2.sendMessage("[SUPPORT]</col><img=5>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
						+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");	
						}

Why wont it work?
Thank you btw <3
